TestCase.TestCaseTitle: Create and update a Facility with CommentText.
TestCase.TestCaseObjective: BSO validation. Verify the ability to create and update the CommentText of a Facility in a nation's C2IS.
TestCase.TestCaseScenario: Nation A creates and updates the CommentText of a Facility. Nation B receives the information and interprets it correctly.
TestCase.TestCaseEnvironment: Internet or Co-located. Exchange Pattern: R/R, P/S.
TestCase.TestCasePreCondition: Nation A has created a Topic which includes message elements belonging in the Facility message schema area, for instance Ground Picture > Infrastructure and Environment. Nation B has subscribed to this Topic.
TestCase.TestCaseConclusion: This test is considered a success if the created and updated CommentText of the Facility is displayed correctly on both Nations' C2IS.

TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepAction: Nation A creates a Facility with a CommentText (a Metadata Element)
TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepResult: Nation B receives and displays the Facility with the CommentText correctly.

TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepAction: Nation A updates the CommentText of the Facility
TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepResult: Nation B receives and displays the Facility with the updated CommentText correctly.
